description: Karma plugin for running Gherkin feature files against CucumberJS in end-to-end tests.
name: karma-cukes
readme:
# Karma Cukes

Karma plugin for running Gherkin feature files through [Cucumber.js](https://github.com/cucumber/cucumber-js). 

Features:

* [Cucumber JSON](https://www.relishapp.com/cucumber/cucumber/docs/formatters/json-output-formatter) reporter reporter
* Built-in browser API for end-to-end testing
